'''Jasper Simmons''' is the son of [[Liza Simmons]].

==History==
Jasper was born prematurely via C-section after his mother developed a tumor on his placenta. During the surgery to remove the tumor, he became unstable, so [[Arizona Robbins|Arizona]] converted to a c-section and delivered him. After his birth, he was given 50% oxygen, which stabilized him enough that his mother was able to see him before he was taken to the NICU.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
His mother had him on her own.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He was born at 29 weeks gestation.
